tool_description: Colorize black and white pictures with AI. Our picture colorizer is based on the latest machine learning research. Web interface: https://hotpot.ai/colorize-picture
name: AI Picture Colorizer
title: AI Picture Colorizer

api_list.name: AI Picture Colorizer
api_list.description:
Colorize pictures with AI, turning black and white photos to color in seconds. Reimagine the past by colorizing pictures of ancestors and historic figures. Our technology is currently based on a mixture of DeOldify and proprietary enhancements.

Web interface: https://hotpot.ai/colorize-picture
